abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33094833, pmid32868961, pmid33080017, pmid32862842, pmid33057633, pmid33052256, pmid33079950, pmid33091020
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.10.27
